metadata.title: CVE-2019-14462 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libmodbus before 3.0.7 and 3.1.x before 3.1.5. There is an out-of-bounds read for the MODBUS_FC_WRITE_MULTIPLE_COILS case, aka VD-1302. It was discovered that libmodbus incorrectly handled inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

notes.note: ebarretto> Note that this fixes also CVE-2019-14463 and introduces a regression, please check CVE-2019-14463 for complete information.

criterions.comment: libmodbus package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.6-1').
